categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The regal, silver-haired Arhul Holt served the Imperial Navy for nearly four decades, but eventually found that he no longer agreed with its principles. Going against seven centuries of family tradition, he defected to the Rebel Alliance with the help of a Rebel commando team and the young HoloNet slicer Pash Galae. His defection spurred several equally high-ranked Rebel sympathizers to follow suit, resulting in a massive embarrassment to the Fleet and the sidelining of Anaxes as a political player in Palpatine's Empire, in favor of other worlds such as Carida.
